text: With custom code you can set any logic that you need to set an owner. You would just need to make sure it triggers at the right time.

Hi Sara, just an idea: have you seen when contacts have 2 emails? when you pull that from the API how does it come? maybe send it the same way? it should be some sort of concatenation if thats even possible for domains, or you could just create custom properties to workaround it
